idea: Superfan.ai is a Services + SaaS company, helping brands identify their Super-Fans using AI & Augmented Reality. Our flagship Fan Data & Engagement platform helps brands like Kolkata Knight Riders identity their fan base, and segregate their fan based on awareness, revenue & engagement
name: HEROLABS INFOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: ADAPT Ideations is an internet of things (IoT) centered innovation agency known for its revolutionary products, platform and expertise in blockchain, mechatronics, embedded intelligence and data analytics. At ADAPT Ideations we are acutely aware of your need for speedy, effective, innovative solutions. Our mantra is “Fail fast, recover faster and learn fastest”.
name: ADAPT IDEATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a manufacturer of Industrial Valves, with a team having experience exclusively in Design and Production of Valve technology for more than two decades. We are driven by the ability to provide innovative & sustainable solutions to your business needs.


Qualified professional & experienced engineers are part of our team to provide the industry with High Quality and Cost-Effective products along with the best suitable engineering solutions & support. We believe in continuous improvements & product innovation to keep ourselves competent.


Our wide range of products comprises of Ball Valves (Metal to Metal Seated & Soft Seated), Double Block & Bleed Ball Valves, Gate, Globe & Check Valves (High Pressure & Pressure Seal Type), Butterfly Valves (Metal to Metal Seat & Triple Offset Design), Control Valves, Dual Plate & Single Plate Check Valves, Diaphragm Valves, Sluice & Safety Valves as per client’s specific requirements in size ranging from ½” to 36” & pressure rating from 150# to 2500#.
name: NOVEL VALVES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: WE ARE MAKING CARTONS,CORRUGATED BOXES,SHRINK FILMS PACKAGING ALL TYPE OF BOXES
name: ASAP TRADERS

idea: SmartSimple IT Solutions is a Company based out of Mumbai, India, we specialize in IT solutions for Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises (SMEs). we have a versatile set of IT skills, extensive knowledge, expertise and experience of about 20 years in the industry.
name: SmartSimple IT Solutions

idea:
www.ipragyan.com


Pragyan Instrument's mission is to provide affordable solutions for material’s thermal, electrical and electronic properties characterization, without compromising the measurement accuracy and precision. 

  • The presence of only the international brands in this space (leading to very expensive instruments), also limits the high-quality research to only TIER-I Institutions, and other well-funded Govt. research labs.

  • Our solution will enable the researchers from TIER-II & TIER-III Institutions, and other Private Labs & Universities to also conduct sophisticated scientific research, with international publication-quality and reliable data.
name: PRAGYAN INSTRUMENTS PRIVATE LIMITED
